title: North Lanarkshire Council cuts back on funding for voluntary organisations following review
description: North Lanarkshire Council has cut back on its funding for voluntary organisations following a review. A shakeup of the system by which grant applications are assessed was voted through at a full council meeting which also saw the annual budget set. One change will be to reduce the maximum grant which can be applied for from £50,000 to £10,000.
